name: Ancientknot
description:
EMBARK ON A JOURNEY IN

You wake up being surrounded by nothing but rocks, plants and signs of an old civilization. Slowly exploring your surroundings you come to the conclusion that you must suffer from amnesia. Your curiosity leads you to discovering your ability to shift worlds- between the abandoned present and the ancient past. Learning about a temple, you make your way to it, hoping to get the answers to all your burning questions and doubts about your being.

Explore crumbs of the past.

Activate objects to make your way through to the temple.

Connect the beams to continue your journey.

Use the device to alter your environment.

But Keep An Eye On Energy Cells! KEYBOARD AND MOUSE

WASD to move

E to interact

Shift to shift worlds

RMB or Backspace to go back

Escape to pause

GAMEPAD (FULL CONTROLLER SUPPORT)

Right Thumbstick to move

A and X to interact

Right Trigger to Shift

B to go back

Start to pause

This game is a solo project for my 4th semester at the htk academy Hamburg. Made with Blender, Substance Painter and Substance Designer, FMOD and Unreal Engine 5. 
All credits for sounds go to WeLoveIndies! <3

If you want to keep up with my next projects, simply want to have a look behind the scenes or get in contact, feel free to check out my Twitter and ArtStation!
